website_summaries.verdict: A high quality, entry level PCP air pistol. Perfect for target practice and small game hunting.
pros: Built-in noise dampening shroud helps to keep your target practice from disturbing the neighbors
The gun has the accuracy and look of a tactical rifle
Capable of firing multiple shots in a row
The gun is comfortable to hold
cons: Sits at a higher price point than its competitors

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Oh yeah, I can confirm the accuracy reported by others and I recommend you included the following to increase your enjoyment level:
customer_reviews.author: Cycling Joe

customer_reviews.title: ... and all I can say is that it is awesome, got it sighted in at 25 yards and ...
customer_reviews.text: I just got this little pistol and all I can say is that it is awesome, got it sighted in at 25 yards and stacks one pellet over the other. Mine is shooting great the Crosman premier 14.3 grain pellets, which is great I can buy them locally everywhere. I usally buy JSB pellets but seens that with this pistol I dont need them since the Crosman pellets work great. I highly recommend it, goes great with a UTG Leapers 3-9x32 AO scope.
customer_reviews.author: Ramon A

customer_reviews.title: This gun shoots well however, the stock is very ...
customer_reviews.text: This gun shoots well however, the stock is very cheap and it is loose because there is only one screw on each side so it rotates back and forth. This is a design flaw that could have been fixed with a plastic pin or additional screw. The second issue is there is no hard sites and the clip sticks up above the barrel. If both of these were fixed I would give it 5 stars. If anyone knows how to fix the loose stock with out duck tape I would be interested.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended as a fun and quality product
customer_reviews.text: Add the stock, an optic, and a "moderator," I recommend DonnyFL, and you've got the firearm equivalent of a short-barrel rifle with a silencer. The NFA tax stamps alone is $400. It's accurate and a blast to fire. Buy extra magazines and get that high-pressure pump. So far, I get about 40+ shots in the pressure "sweet spot" but it's so fun, best to get an electric high-pressure air pump to save your back.
customer_reviews.author: David M.

customer_reviews.title: great value
customer_reviews.text: great carbine/pistol, quiet, shoots 1 inch at 30 yards for me with most pellets (some not at all - the non-lead struggled, but the diablo and HN lead pellets did very well). Down side is how many shots you get - i get 25 or so before the gauge gets to 2,000 psi. the carbine buttstock doesn't fit perfect, it moves a bit, and it feels a bit too light. i'm thinking of getting an aftermarket wood one. the only thing that i think would really improve it is to get a bit more speed out of the pellets. But, it deserves 5 stars, it is very light, very quiet, and shoots very straight.
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: game changer
customer_reviews.text: I've had a lot of BB guns and pellet guns over the years. I've had some pretty accurate ones in the past. This gun is a complete Game Changer. Insanely accurate insanely quiet and efficient. If you're thinking about getting into a PCP rifle this one is great.
customer_reviews.author: Jameson

customer_reviews.title: if you can, buy one
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this gun. Good power, very adjustable and customizable. This thing shoots almost any pellet well. I only wish there was a better way to charge it, but it is a pcp. filling it with a hand pump is good exercise.
customer_reviews.author: musiclover

customer_reviews.title: Ca-Chow
customer_reviews.text: Love this little guy. Short very maneuverable, light weight, extreamly accurate. Will replace your break barrel. The gun is very tunable. Set at 15-17 fpe this gun will do the dirt out to 50yards but should be kept under 40 pretty flat between 20-35 yards. I have mine paired with an urgent bug buster. Zeroed at 22yards or so I run out of scope around 60-5 yards as the hold over runs out of mil dots. Anyways it's made in America, has a pretty good aftermarket, and slings crosman domed, and hallow points @14.3grain pellets threw the same hole from 3,000-1000 psi
customer_reviews.author: JKB

customer_reviews.title: Happy Customer.
customer_reviews.text: It the Cadillac of crosman air pistols. Top shelf equipment. Well worth the investment. Happy Customer. :)
customer_reviews.author: Reginald Braggs

customer_reviews.title: Critter getter.
customer_reviews.text: Only problem other then the wobble stock for open sites, is the magazine did not fit in the breach. After removing the barrel shroud and loosening the screws that hold the barrel, and nudging it forward the magazine fit. I wish they sold a stock replacement here on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Wick

customer_reviews.title: Very quiet!
customer_reviews.text: Very quiet! Starlings don't stand a chance out to 30-40 yards. I got the .22 and refill with my 88 ci Air Venturi air cylinder married up with a Shoebox Freedom8 pump. Recommend getting the Pelletgage (dotcom) to measure your pellets which will cut down on “flyers”.
customer_reviews.author: The Raganator

customer_reviews.title: Perfect small game pistol
customer_reviews.text: I've had this pistol for less than a week and i already love it. Dead on accuracy. Very easy to fill with my hand pump. Its tuned perfectly out of the box. I've taken 8 pigeons with it and its just the perfect power for that. Only complaint is the lose fitting stock. The trigger is great also very light pull.
customer_reviews.author: Tony B

customer_reviews.title: A nice, accurate
customer_reviews.text: A nice, accurate, powerful gun. Very repeatable shot groups, and easy to fill with a hand pump. I rated it 4 instead of 5 because it doesn't really work well as a pistol. Way out of balance for a hand gun. I use it as a carbine with the included stock.
customer_reviews.author: Av8r

customer_reviews.title: An excellent air pistol/rifle!
customer_reviews.text: An excellent air gun for the price. I especially like the fact you can turn it into a rifle very easily in 2 or 3 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Skip

customer_reviews.title: I like it but when I attach its shoulder stock it ...
customer_reviews.text: I like it but when I attach its shoulder stock it hard to say fix stable (Just stay with a single screw). it should be improved.
customer_reviews.author: Akiyoshi Niimi

customer_reviews.title: powerful and accurate
customer_reviews.text: I own a Marauder rifle (Gen 1) which has amazing knock down power with Beeman Crow Magnum 18 grain pellets. Very accurate but it weighs a ton. This pistol with H&N terminator 16 grain pellets comes surprisingly close in power and accuracy and feels light as a feather compared to the rifle. I have it set up with the included carbine stock and a red dot sight and it's great out to 50 feet or so, the rifle 2 or 3 times that distance. I easily get two mags (16 shots) between pump ups. Once you try PCP air guns, there is no going back to springers, not even nitro pistons.
customer_reviews.author: Desert Rat

customer_reviews.title: The air is leaking
customer_reviews.text: Brand new gun, and first time use: Hand pumped the gun to 2800 PSI, after 20 hours, only 500 PSI air left in the gun. Please NOTE: this product is NOT refundable!!!!! Tried to contact customer service: NO output, tried to put questions under the page: NO result!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and compact
customer_reviews.text: I'm quite satisfied with this weapon. Much lighter that the rifle. I use it with the carbine stock and I recommend the Bulldog Cases Hybrid 31-Inch Black Tactical Rifle Case which I also purchased from Amazon. You give up some power with the pistol but the weight and size differences are worth the trade off for my application.
customer_reviews.author: T. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Great gun but watch out for 0-ring issue.
customer_reviews.text: I love this gun but just after I started using the gun i developed a slow air leak around the valve that holds the pressure gauge. I guess its a common problem with some owners? I would advice ordering a o-ring kit in the event it starts to happen to you. I used a set of 3/4 o-rings i picked up in the plumbing department at lowes. Theres a great video on you youtube that explains how to replace the o-rings with issue. Everyone I show the gun to is impressed buy how accurate the gun is! Also love the pistol option!
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Fun to shoot
customer_reviews.text: Added a DonnyFL Shogun Silencer. Noise is eliminated and deceptively quiet, pellet hitting a paper target is louder than the shot. Great plinker and has decent power for a "pistol".
customer_reviews.author: RW

customer_reviews.title: Great little pistol/carbine
customer_reviews.text: Very accurate & enough power for small pests. Can also be used for turkey at closer ranges and where legal.
customer_reviews.author: Beek2350

customer_reviews.title: Great Gun
customer_reviews.text: WOW!! I'm new to the air gun game, but this a real nice gun. I started with a Benjamin np trail which had a nice feel and was easy to cock but the sites were terrible. I finally got it sited in, but the slightest touch would knock it out. I then went with a hatsan 25 it shot well and plenty of power but a bear to operate, so I threw done the cash and bought the Marauder 😀 now we're talking. I put a reflex site on it and it will drive tacks. Decided to go with the scuba tank refil setup instead of a $200 hand pump. It's fast and simple and I don't break a sweat.
customer_reviews.author: triumph02rider

customer_reviews.title: PROD Lives up to Expectations!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome little pistol. Accurate out to about 30 yards and not pellet fussy. It will shoot whatever in a nice tight group. I've put JSB's, predator polymags and the Crossman Premier Hollow Points and it likes all of 'em. Hard hitting, great amount of shots. Wish the stock could be secured a little tighter, there is a scosh of movement, but it's my go to around the house rifle for pests and the like.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stick'em up !
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this product. Good quality and very accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing!! Can not say enough good things about my marauder pistol. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: C. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Great little gun when you respect its limitations.
customer_reviews.text: Obviously not a 100 yard gun, but perfect for small game/pesting up to 35-40 yards. The stock wobbles due to the single-point mounting design but I have installed an aftermarket custom stock on it and now it's absolutely perfect.
customer_reviews.author: MOFO

customer_reviews.title: more like a carbine that a pistol - I love it
customer_reviews.text: Crosman is the benchmark for the entry level PCP guns, and this is quality throughout. Accurate, and powerful. It performs ;more like a carbine that a pistol - I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Watchman

customer_reviews.title: This Benjamin Marauder is as good as it gets
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a powerful, accurate .22 caliber pellet pistol then look no further. This Benjamin Marauder is as good as it gets. While it pumps up nicely with a manual pump, I'd highly recommend a tank. The best shot string happens between 1500 to 2500 PSI, so there's no need to pressurize the pistol to maximum. I found I get the best shot groups from Crosman Premier Magnum Pellets at a nice 1/2" group at 20 Yards! If you plan on using this pistol for pest control, I would highly recommend a premium-quality scope and H&N Hornet pellets for a humane take-down. I used a Nikon Scope and an Atlas Bipod on my Marauder. Deadly accurate combination...
customer_reviews.author: Mark F

customer_reviews.title: Love this PCP.
customer_reviews.text: I got a great price on Amazon. The pistol is legendary. Check out YouTube.
customer_reviews.author: Mike H.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Slap on a good red dot sight and this pistol is a backyard varmint eliminator.
customer_reviews.author: Erasmus Coli

customer_reviews.title: Pleasant surprise....
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. I put an EOTech XPS2-RF red dot sight on this and it's light and maneuverable; wife likes the size and weight as well. Zeroed it in with some targets at ~60 feet and seems to be working well. Will soon be trying the non-lead Haendler and Natermann pellets alongside of the normal lead ones. A great companion to my Marauder .177 cal rifle.
customer_reviews.author: J. Weiland

customer_reviews.title: Wow! Very high quality and accuracy superb for the ...
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Very high quality and accuracy superb for the price. Initial testing was 5 shots in a one inch spread.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: absolutely love this airgun!
customer_reviews.text: Very powerful for a pistol. Yet quiet. Wonderfully accurate. Although it should come with some kind of sights & an extra clip. Would now like to know what upgrades are available for it. Definitely a 5 star air pistol. Buy one if you can.
customer_reviews.author: James Horner

customer_reviews.title: Love this Pistol!
customer_reviews.text: I'll be brief, this pistol is accurate, fun to use, very affordable (though the pump and the tank adds to cost), and is very well built. I hope to use it for years at the range and out finding a few tasty small game foods. Rabbit loins are going for 40 bucks on the internet! Who needs that when one has this Marauder pistol.
customer_reviews.author: TR

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this pistol. Great accuracy using a UTG 3x9-32Bugbuster 1 inch scope with Crossman domed pellets.
customer_reviews.author: Madelyn S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this little pistol very accurate easy to use nice and quiet
customer_reviews.author: Serge DesRosiers

customer_reviews.title: Bolts jam
customer_reviews.text: Waited over a month for it and haven't even had it for a week and the bolt is jamming. Now I'm dreading the jumping through f#$&!; Hoops to get it fixed or replaced. Very upset.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Apodaca

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this pistol for plinking and pest control, cheapest on amazon with prime shipping!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best gun for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Great little gun, don't b fooled by it's size though, it packs a punch, shot count is excellent and recharging it back up to 3000 psi is a breeze, you might want to get a few extra clips with your order, shooting a repeater pcp is a whole another world....OF FUN! Great for hunting small game moderate distances and very very quiet. I wish it was also made in .177 cal
customer_reviews.author: Salvador M.

customer_reviews.title: cant go wrong with this varmint slayer
customer_reviews.text: This was my alternative to my over weight benjy maruder full size what a difference very light and extremely accurate I throw it on my atv for snakes and varmints cant go wrong with this one.
customer_reviews.author: lowell t.

customer_reviews.title: Very good buy for the money
customer_reviews.text: It was packaged well. No flaws or defects that I could see when I got it. Shoots very accurate. Getting nickel to quarter size groups depending on the pellet I use. Very good buy for the money. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Loved my first one and had to buy a second pistol.
customer_reviews.author: Richard R. Rojas

customer_reviews.title: Can't be happier with this gun
customer_reviews.text: Can't be happier with this gun. I am actually going to order my Air Venturi Tank as well from Amazon to use on this gun.
customer_reviews.author: A.H

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Great pcp has the power I was looking for and super accurate
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Wing

customer_reviews.title: Not silent, but doesn't annoy the nieghbors
customer_reviews.text: It costs a lot, But I don't regret it. Pretty quiet. Powerful.
customer_reviews.author: hangtime

customer_reviews.title: Great starter PCP!
customer_reviews.text: Incredible accuracy. I have other springer rifles and I have not touched them since I purchased this. I use a hand pump and it is not difficult to fill this gun since it has a very small cyclinder. I have been shooting from 2600psi down to around 1000psi lately. I can shoot 24 good rounds per fill, maybe more but 3 magazines worth is enough. No need to fill to 3000 psi. Great fun!
customer_reviews.author: Rick from Westport, MA

customer_reviews.title: This is not the place to decide if you want this....Its the place where you buy it.
customer_reviews.text: If your looking at this on amazon your at the point where these reviews are just being read to help sway you, there is more information on the web about this air rifle than most people would care to read, if your this far in just but it already. Want more.... well Im glad I finally bought mine I love it for its intended purpose, light agile short range varmint elimination and some good ol fun plinking with a multishot mag. Easy to use, easy to adjust, easy to modify, easy to like, affordable. Good for a first timer or for seasoned airgunners alike.
customer_reviews.author: Zeuki1

customer_reviews.title: Good product so far
customer_reviews.text: The product works as advertised. Product arrived incomplete, no magazine for pellets.
customer_reviews.author: Kurtis

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great little gun when it works, but after only one year it would no longer hold air...big bummer
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: best air pistol for the price and than some.
customer_reviews.text: very accurate i can shoot dime size groups at 75ft all day long, i tried the stock extension and it works fine, yes there is a noticeable up down wiggle that is easily by taking off stock and using electrical or similar tap wrap the bottom of the pistol grip add layers of tape until is stops movement.. or do as i do and just use the pistol grips. i put in 2950psi and there appears to be zero leak down over a week, i am impressed. either way this is a great buy
customer_reviews.author: WSPJR

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: love it with pump- priceless, small-handy-quiet -powerful - 30-40 shots per charge. 60-80 pumps to full charge. Adjustable valve and spring. when you buy spare magazine- make sure it for Marauder PISTOL .22 , not RIFLE .22 - - they are different. Pump the same.
customer_reviews.author: marat

customer_reviews.title: Expensive, but worth every penny. Accurate, powerful ...
customer_reviews.text: Expensive, but worth every penny. Accurate, powerful and well built. 700 FPS with a .22 caliber pellet packs a punch.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby Boyer

customer_reviews.title: Awsome pelgun! Gamo got nuttin on this baby!
customer_reviews.text: This pelgun rocks! I have no complaints but for the one screw pistol grip. It's cheesy at best. But as far as accuracy this one is hard to beat. I use kodiak copper clads and same hole shots are the norm at 20-25 yards. I have my scba tank and a hand pump. I recommend the scba simply for convenience. Preppers should have the hand pump available. I have the UTG sniper scope ($100) and it has parallax focus. It is almost as big as the gun. LOL! Deadly .22 and is very easy carry. Backpackers need this one for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Pilot

customer_reviews.title: Really nice gun.
customer_reviews.text: Almost gave it a 4, because of customer service. The gun is great. Came with a leaky pressure gauge. Called them up and said they would get a gauge out right away. A week later no gauge. Called them up, forgot. Sent out the new gauge this time via a slow boat from China. Start to finish 3 weeks. Not happy about that at all. Must say the gun really is nice. Lots of accurate shots before a fill. I would highly recommend it. Just know the company will stand behind it, though a bit slow.
customer_reviews.author: DIVER

customer_reviews.title: Most awesome airgun I own!
customer_reviews.text: This gun is very lightweight and super accurate. The adjustable trigger pull is a very nice feature and I am really pleased where I have it set, which is about a third of the pull at the factory setting. I had a minor problem and Crosman customer service is fantastic - a real person answered the phone after two rings and I was connected to a Rep in less than a minute and she took care of my problem to my satisfaction.
customer_reviews.author: Charlier

customer_reviews.title: Happy Happy Happy
customer_reviews.text: Accurate little air gun, out of the box I put a scope on it and it was shooting right on target with no adjustments at 25 yards. Happy Happy Happy.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Plinking pleasure
customer_reviews.text: lots of fun. accurate. The extra air tube from airgun lab is a must the shot count is about 60 per fill. Fun. Fun. Fun.
customer_reviews.author: joe

customer_reviews.title: Excellent air pistol with some draw backs
customer_reviews.text: Very accurate and packs quite a wallop. A little pricey and quite a work out to pump up, however the alternative is far more expensive. Their has to be a cheaper alternative to fill an air tank and have it ready to go when needed. Also, magazine is rather cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Was what I expected it to be. Shoulder stock doesn't fit without shimming it.
customer_reviews.author: j crook

customer_reviews.title: High Quality, fair price.
customer_reviews.text: Owned a .25 marauder Rifle, this is the perfect complement, light, powerful and accurate. Along with being supplied with optional stock, is a very nice detail. some minor details to maybe improve. a) Pressure cap in refill port is not what we expect from Benjamin b) Benjamin option for a true suppressor, sound level increases in low pressure¡? high quality for a fair price.
customer_reviews.author: Alvaro A. Bravo Kohler

customer_reviews.title: Hawaii808
customer_reviews.text: Excellent tack driver with power. Sound suppression works great. Got a half inch group at 50 yards. Darnn good for a pistol. Just don't ask me to do it everyday! Great price and free shipping from Amazon is an amazin deal!
customer_reviews.author: Chopper808

customer_reviews.title: i really like this PCP
customer_reviews.text: *Christine\s husband here* I have wanted one of these for a long time and jumped on the sale Amazon had. I find it to be plenty accurate out to the 30 yards I am going to shoot it and for those that hunt squirrels it will do the job to that distance.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Frustrated with initial breaking-in
customer_reviews.text: I installed a scope on this newly-purchased airgun. In the process of sighting-in the gun decided it didn't want to fire anymore. So I ordered a degassing tool thinking it would take care of the problem. I followed the directions re. the degassing process, but was unable to make headway. I will be packing the unit up and sending it to the factory for repairs.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: It is as quiet and as accurate as they all ...
customer_reviews.text: It is as quiet and as accurate as they all say inside 20 yards, which is as much space as I have. After 24 shots it fills in about 38 pumps from the hand pump.
customer_reviews.author: Paul A.

customer_reviews.title: Air heads unite
customer_reviews.text: Curious as to why the original box was opened but that box was inside an amazon box so I guess it may have been a security thing. Otherwise the item was delivered when promised. No problems with the item.
customer_reviews.author: Rico

customer_reviews.title: ... a PCP carbine for the price that is any better.. This thing is hole on hole within ...
customer_reviews.text: You can't get a PCP carbine for the price that is any better.. This thing is hole on hole within 40 yards.. And very efficient..
customer_reviews.author: ToRmEnToR

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding air pistol which is lightweight and highly accurate. ...
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding air pistol which is lightweight and highly accurate. With the proper scope, this pistol is dead on accurate. Highly suggested!
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: this is the best PCP airgun on the market
customer_reviews.text: For the money, this is the best PCP airgun on the market... Read what others say as well. (Google.com Benjamin Marauder Pistol)
customer_reviews.author: Len Smith

customer_reviews.title: Kapow
customer_reviews.text: This pcp air pistol is way better than i thought it would be.
customer_reviews.author: Dave B.

customer_reviews.title: An excellent air pistol/carbine
customer_reviews.text: This gun is my first introduction to PCPs. The pistol is very quiet and accurate, right out of the box. I've enjoyed this gun so much more than my gas piston rifles. I highly recommend this gun for those who are thinking about PCPs. It's light weight, quiet, and accurate. You can't ask for more.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney P. Cruse

customer_reviews.title: Most likely will return unless I am sent a new clip and it starts shooting better groups with a new type of mag I ordered
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with a faulty clip loader. I took the gun before opening even to a gun shop where they opened it and put a scope on to sight. The gunsmith noted that my clips spring wasn't working properly therefore my gun is a 1 shot gun unless I want to buy another clip. So I was shipped a defective product. Not very excited about my gun. Also the gunsmith was less than impressed with the spread. Most likely will return unless I am sent a new clip and it starts shooting better groups with a new type of mag I ordered. I paid almost $400 for a single shot pistol... not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Jarrett

customer_reviews.title: nice for the little ones
customer_reviews.text: Like the look of this but the stock makes it a little uncomfortable for me to use but my wife likes it so I keep it
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent out of box. This was the updated piztal with the manufacture corrections, no moding needed.
customer_reviews.author: Gizmo

customer_reviews.title: So much better than the Discovery I bought for my boy..WRONG!!!
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: This gun started falling apart shortly after I bought it. I started leaking and a valve stem broke. i took it to a repair guy and he said it was toast, and that it wasn't a new gun at all, as advertised. He said it wasn't worth fixing, so I threw it out, I was sooo mad! I am tired of being scammed by Amazon sellers, this happened to me with a Discovery rifle, too.. I want my money back!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Hanna B.

customer_reviews.title: Gold standard
customer_reviews.text: Read all the available reviews. Marauder pistol is a gold standard
customer_reviews.author: Ronald C. Galyon

customer_reviews.title: so much fun!
customer_reviews.text: Love this pistol! Perfect squirrel smacker within 35 yards. Mounted a bug buster scope which I am very happy with.
customer_reviews.author: andrew rasmussen

customer_reviews.title: Fun..
customer_reviews.text: First one had a sticky trigger that got stuck when the pistol was pumped up to 3000 psi which was strange. The replacement i received works great.. Trigger did stick a couple times though. Extremely easy to pump with a pcp pump. I believe with a hill mk4 it takes 90 strokes to get 2700psi. Very accurate pistol and fun to shoot. Not very powerful though best for target practice breaking crap or small game.
customer_reviews.author: Dr.smooth

customer_reviews.title: Box full of AWESOME !!!
customer_reviews.text: Great accurate gun, Mr Squirrel does not a stand a chance ,. same goes for Mr Opossum and Mr Racoon. The gun has a bit of a bark out of the box , but there are shroud extensions available to counter that and make it whisper quiet. Only real drawback to this gun is the magazine rattles when you have pellets in it while walking. But you keep the gun upright or pointed down while hunting the rattling is muted. And there are also single shot mods trays you can do away with the mag and make it a single shot if one desires total stealth. Overall i am VERY pleased with this purchase as my first PcP air rifle.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas West

customer_reviews.title: benjamin pcp pistol
customer_reviews.text: Item was triple boxed and arrived in perfect condition. In use has been as good as expected. Waiting on better weather to use more. Best accuracy with Benjamin premium round head 14.1g. Seems to be a good 30 yd. or less outfit.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth gale

customer_reviews.title: Total dud
customer_reviews.text: Would not hold air, pumped to 2800 psi, in 12 hours it had leaked internally to 800 without firing one shot. Crosman didn't help at at, they just said return it to Amazon. Ok no problem, Amazon was great to deal with. Bought a Hatsan pcp instead. Will never buy another one of these.
customer_reviews.author: CandleGrader

customer_reviews.title: poor quality
customer_reviews.text: It is very bad quality.I bought one, after couple of shot it didn't work anymore. Seriously poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Iman

customer_reviews.title: Extremely fun and accurate
customer_reviews.text: I'm having best results using H&N heavy pellets. But for most plinking, Crosman 13.5gr pellets work fine. The Maurauder can empty an entire magazine into one shredded hole at 30ft using a reddot sight. I call that good accuracy for a pellet pistol.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff O'Reilly

product_meta.title: Benjamin Marauder BP2220 .22-Caliber PCP Air Pistol, Black
product_meta.description: An excellent choice for hunting, the new Benjamin Marauder . 22-caliber PCP air pistol is ultra-quiet and more than accurate enough to easily take small game from up to 33 yards away. The improved trigger on the Marauder pistol has an adjustable, two-stage drop-sear trigger utilizing precision heat-treated metal components. The mechanism is designed and built to the same exacting standards as the very popular Marauder rifle trigger group. The Marauder PCP Pistol features a durable synthetic stock, self-indexing 8-shot clip and a 12-inch choked and shrouded barrel, delivering up to 700 fps. Overall length of the pistol from the grip is 18-inches with an integrated pressure gauge. A shoulder stock is included and is easily interchangeable with the pistol grip. With 3000-psi of compressed air, this air gun has the muscle to quietly and dependably get the job done.
feature_bullets: PCP-POWERED . 22-CALIBER AIR PISTOL – With durable synthetic stock and integrated pressure gauge
12-INCH RIFLED STEEL BARREL – Choked and shrouded for noise reduction
3000-psi COMPRESSED AIR CAPACITY – Delivers up to 700 fps
BOLT ACTION WITH 8-SHOT ROTARY MAGAZINE – Two-stage, drop-sear trigger
